languages.text: "Почему бы и нет? Я могу себе это позволить. Или, может, я просто не верю, что ты сгодишься для чего-то большего".
"Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."
languages.original_text: "Почему бы и нет? Я могу себе это позволить. Или, может, я просто не верю, что ты сгодишься для чего-то большего".

traits.locale_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “我凭什么不能嘲笑你呢？我想怎么样都行。或许，只是因为我不相信你能做得到更困难的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."

traits.locale_text: “我凭什么不能嘲笑你呢？我想怎么样都行。或许，只是因为我不相信你能做得到更困难的事情。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «¿Y por qué no iba a hacerlo? Tengo derecho a disfrutar. O al o mejor es que no creo que seas capaz de hacer más».
languages.original_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y por qué no iba a hacerlo? Tengo derecho a disfrutar. O al o mejor es que no creo que seas capaz de hacer más».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「それの何が悪い？こちらとて楽しませてもらいたいのでね。もしくは、貴様にはその程度の仕事しかできないと思っているのかもしれないな」
languages.original_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."

traits.locale_text: 「それの何が悪い？こちらとて楽しませてもらいたいのでね。もしくは、貴様にはその程度の仕事しかできないと思っているのかもしれないな」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Warum sollte ich nicht? Ich darf mich doch amüsieren. Oder vielleicht glaube ich einfach nicht, dass Ihr noch zu irgendetwas fähig seid."
languages.original_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."

traits.locale_text: "Warum sollte ich nicht? Ich darf mich doch amüsieren. Oder vielleicht glaube ich einfach nicht, dass Ihr noch zu irgendetwas fähig seid."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Et alors ? Je me divertis comme je veux. Ou alors, c'est peut-être parce que je ne vous crois pas capable de beaucoup plus. »
languages.original_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."

traits.locale_text: « Et alors ? Je me divertis comme je veux. Ou alors, c'est peut-être parce que je ne vous crois pas capable de beaucoup plus. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Neden almayacakmışım? Benim de zevklerim var. Belki de daha zor bir işi becerebileceğini düşünmüyorumdur."
languages.original_text: "Why shouldn't I? I'm allowed to enjoy myself. Or perhaps it's just that I don't believe you're capable of anything more."

traits.locale_text: "Neden almayacakmışım? Benim de kendi zevklerim var. Belki de daha zor bir işi yapabileceğini düşünmüyorumdur."
traits.speaker: Anger
